title: Zero Trust Gateway Application and Application Type mappings
description: Applications are a way to group domains, IP CIDRs, and port numbers under a single identifier. This applies operations performed on network traffic to all application members. Application Types are a way to group different Applications together. Application IDs and Application Type IDs can be provided as part of the 'traffic' wirefilter expression in Secure Web Gateway rules.

links.title: List Application and Application Type mappings
links.description: List all Application and Application Type mappings

id.description: The identifier for this application. There is only one application per id.

name.description: The name of the application or application type.

application_type_id.description: The identifier for the type of this application. There can be many applications with the same type. This refers to the `id` of an Application Type that has been returned.

id.description: The identifier for the type of this application. There can be many applications with the same type. This refers to the `id` of an Application Type that has been returned.

name.description: The name of the application or application type.

description.example: "Applications used to communicate or collaborate in a business setting."
description.description: A short summary of applications with this type.

This applies operations performed on network traffic to all application members. Application Types are a way to group different Applications together.
